pages.title: Meal Cooker
pages.text: The meal cooker is a block that can produce meals from foods in your main hand and offhand or from a single item.

pages.title: Meal Cooker
pages.text: If you have a Fried Egg in your offhand and a Fried Sophie/Cooked Lucia/Toasted Fabricio in your main hand, it will give you a Fried Sophie and Fried Egg Meal/Cooked Lucia and Fried Egg Meal and a Toasted Fabricio and Fried Egg Meal respectively. And if you right-click it with the "Spoon" item, it will give you a Pasta meal, and it's also infinite, so... infinite meals!
